name: Menagerie Moon
description:
Hello. You must be the new custodian of the Menagerie Moons! You arrived just in time. I need you to check up on the animals and try to figure out just how many of them are out there! OK, now, hurry up! The first moon is just over there. Come on, you don't have all day!

  • Move the mouse to change view.
  • Press up and down or W and S to count up and down.
  • Type in a two digit number to instantly set the count.

Thanks for playing! Contact  me at @snicklodocus or @nedmakesgames. Watch me make games live on Twitch! Thank you!
